correctness.rationale: Multiple inaccuracies, unsupported assumptions, and a schema violation are present despite some correct elements (SALD method, 200 °C, 63 ms residence, GPC ~1.7 Å, 176 cycles, polycrystalline ZnO, AFM roughness ~17.3, n≈1.99). Key issues: (1) Film thickness is incorrect: 176 cycles × 1.7 Å ≈ 300 Å ≈ 30 nm, but 300 nm is reported; both occurrences should be corrected. (2) Co-reactants: ammonia is explicitly present with water in the oxidant stream during ZnO growth; only H2O is listed—NH3 should be added. (3) Flow rates: values given as sccm are mapped from partial pressures (100 and 35 mTorr) and not reported as flows; units are also likely wrong (SCM-PER-MIN ≠ sccm). These should be removed or left unknown rather than fabricated. (4) Carrier/purging gas set to nitrogen without support in the text (only ‘inert’ is stated). (5) plasmaPower is set to null, violating the schema (optional field but cannot be null)—omit this field. (6) Substrate: ZnO was deposited on Al2O3 dielectric (on Cr/glass), not directly on borosilicate glass for the 300 Å film; substrate should reflect Al2O3/Cr/glass. (7) Saturation=True and nucleationPeriod=10 cycles are not supported by the article for ZnO; values should be revised (saturation not demonstrated for ZnO; nucleation period not reported). (8) Numerous material properties are fabricated or not traceable: band gap (3.3 eV, Tauc), absorption coefficient, resistivity, carrier density (and noted as Hall), uniformity 50%, conformality AR=10, film density (value/unit inconsistent and not reported), elemental concentrations and atomic ratio from XPS/RBS. These should be removed or replaced with sourced values. (9) Device properties: mobility 17.2 cm2/V·s is supported, but threshold voltage 2.8 V pertains to a passivated device in a different context; subthreshold swing and on/off ratio are not reported and should be removed. Overall, several fields are not traceable to the article and one clear schema violation exists.

completeness.rationale: Largely incomplete/incorrect and not schema-faithful. Key issues: (1) Multiple ZnO SALD processes in the article are conflated. The TFT ZnO deposition (DEZ 310 mTorr; H2O 170 mTorr plus ~6 Torr NH3; residence time 63 ms; 176 cycles; ~300 Å ≈ 30 nm on Al2O3/Cr/glass) and the selective-deposition studies (e.g., DEZ 100 mTorr, H2O 35 mTorr on borosilicate glass; 600–1200 cycles) should be extracted as separate processes. (2) Film thickness is wrong by an order of magnitude: 300 nm is reported, but the text implies ~300 Å from 1.7 Å/cycle × 176 cycles. (3) Substrate is incorrect for the TFT ZnO film (listed as borosilicate glass but should be on Al2O3 dielectric over Cr-coated glass; borosilicate glass was used for inhibition studies). (4) Co-reactant stream composition is incomplete: the article explicitly adds ammonia to the water stream during ZnO growth; NH3 is not captured. (5) Flow parameters are not traceable: values given as sccm are fabricated and appear to copy partial pressures (100/35 mTorr) from a different experiment; the TFT process reports partial pressures (DEZ 310 mTorr, H2O 170 mTorr, NH3 ~6 Torr), not flows. (6) Carrier/purging gas set to nitrogen is not specified in the article. (7) Several parameters are invented: saturation=True for ZnO, nucleationPeriod=10 cycles, subthreshold swing, on/off ratio, absorption coefficient, band gap, resistivity, carrier density, uniformity (50%), conformality aspect ratio, XPS composition, and film density; none are reported. Hall measurements are not described; mobility values in the paper are device μFE, not Hall. (8) Schema issues: plasmaPower is present as null (violates schema—omit if not PEALD); filmThickness appears both inside thicknessControl and again at processParameters level, conflicting with additionalProperties constraints; many required materialProperties fields are filled with untraceable/fabricated values. (9) Minor: ammonia dopant not represented in coReactant list; supercycleDesign is unnecessary for a binary process. To improve: split into at least two coherent processes (TFT ZnO and selective-deposition ZnO), correct film thickness (~30 nm) and substrate, record partial pressures and NH3 co-reactant for the TFT process, remove unreported properties or replace with traceable values (e.g., refractive index 1.99 at 700 nm, AFM roughness 17.3), omit plasmaPower, and avoid inventing flow rates, uniformity, conformality, composition, and band gap.
